memberdef.argsstring: (int i_r, int i_phi, int i_z, int i_ppara, int i_pperp, int i_time, int i_q, int n_phi, int n_z, int n_ppara, int n_pperp, int n_time, int n_q)
memberdef.name: dist_5D_index

briefdescription.para: Internal function calculating the index in the histogram array.
Update the histogram from full-orbit particles.

detaileddescription.para: This function updates the histogram from the particle data. Bins are calculated as vector op and histogram is updates as an atomic operation to avoid race conditions.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD particle struct at the end of current time step
pointer to SIMD particle struct at the start of current time step

briefdescription.para: Update the histogram from guiding center markers.

detaileddescription.para: This function updates the histogram from the marker data. Bins are calculated as vector op and histogram is updates as an atomic operation to avoid race conditions.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to SIMD gc struct at the end of current time step
pointer to SIMD gc struct at the start of current time step
